data.title: ‎‘Broadminded’ review by Chad Hartigan • Letterboxd
data.meta_description: Can't believe the similarities between Joe E. Brown and 90's Jim Carrey, including almost exact replicas of the "Do I have something in my teeth?" scene from Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls and the spilled salt scene from Dumb and Dumber. Has no one ever written about this before?
data.text: Letterboxd is an independent service created by a small team, and we rely mostly on the support of our members to maintain our site and apps. Please consider upgrading to a Pro account—for less than a couple bucks a month, you’ll get cool additional features like all-time and annual stats pages (example), the ability to select (and filter by) your favorite streaming services, and no ads!
